column2: "/ci2 2 Oh, this is a weird place. This could be tough, so let's handle the E-Trial together. Tetra's here too."
"/ci2 2 Was that all? Aww, does that mean we have to go home?"
"We failed? Oh well, we'll try harder next time. Thanks for your help."
"Ohh... This is serious. Sorry, Tetra. That moon is throwing me off."
"Ah, Tetra's dead again. It's just like the first time we met."
"/ci1 2 /mn22 Quit mooning over your boots, already! There's an E-Trial, Zect! Hey, you there! Can you help us too?"
"/ci2 2 Oh, hey, you changed your boots' Weapon Form from Serpen to Fubuki. Hey, see you guys around!"
"Darn it, I was so focused on Zect's leg parts that I couldn't focus on fighting. Sorry about this!"
"Aha, looks like Mr. \"I want to get stepped on\" finally got his wish..."
